price: 8 auxquels ils reprochaient uniquement de croire en Allah, digne de toutes les louanges et Tout-Puissant,
arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā naqamū min'hum illā an yu'minū bil-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
